metadata.title: CVE-2021-30587 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Compositing in Google Chrome prior to92.0.4515.107 allowed a remote attacker to potentially spoof the contentsof the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
